page.title: 01GENERAL
page.content: The major part of the area is sparsely populated with isolated farm houses and cottages. The area known as Over is mainly residential.There is one large council owned estate and many private dwellings. Small shops border the access route.The activities of the area are predominantly those associated with farming.This is mainly the rearing of dairy cattle (80%) on the clay soils to the north and arable farming (mainly vegetable root crops) on the sandy soils to the south. Sand also provides the only industry in the area, the Tarmac Roadstone Sand Quarries at New Common.This expanding industry provides construction materials for much of the county. Recreational amenities in the area can be found at Marton Sands (watersports) the Knights Grange Complex and the Whitegate Way.
